name: Minetest Big Pack
description:
Minetest 5.3 with a lot of mods that seemed to work find with provided giant maps.
Windows version is preconfigured and if you run linux you can copy the worlds and mods folder to your installation folder.
You can use provided antimicro config to play the game via gamepad.

Disclamer
I am not the author of the minetest game, maps or mods, i packed and tested their many versions to make them work together.
